sysevent_in_email_action.description:
This inbound email action is triggered when an email is sent to ServiceNow and:
1. The email is a reply. 2. The email being replied to was sent by ServiceNow due to an update or creation of a Support Case. 4. The Case state is Closed. 5. The email content should automatically generate a watermark for that case, if you delete it, this inbound action will not be triggered. For example: Do not delete the following message: Ref:MSG0000020
This inbound email action will send a notification email to the user stating that the Case is already closed. It calls the email notification "Case closed no email".
The activity log of the closed Case will not be updated.
sysevent_in_email_action.name: email to support case already closed
